documentation.title: Superfluous Whitespace
documentation.standard: There should be no superfluous whitespace at the start of a file.

code.title: Valid: No whitespace preceding first content in file.

code_comparison.code: <?php echo 'opening PHP tag at start of file';

code.title: Invalid: Whitespace used before content in file.

documentation.standard: There should be no trailing whitespace at the end of lines.

code.title: Valid: No whitespace found at end of line.
Invalid: Whitespace found at end of line.

documentation.standard: There should be no more than one consecutive blank newline in functions.

code.title: Valid: Functions do not contain multiple empty lines in a row.
Invalid: Functions contain multiple empty lines in a row.

documentation.standard: There should be no superfluous whitespace at the end of a file. A single final newline is allowed. A closing PHP tag is optional and ignored.

code.title: Valid: A single newline appears after the last content in the file.
Invalid: Multiple newlines appear after the last content in the file.
